Geology compiled from more than 90 sources. Basement geology in central and north Idaho, compiled on Lambert conformal conic 1:750,000 base from 1976. Surficial geology for the entire state and bedrock and basement geology south of the Snake River and in southeast Idaho, compiled on shaded relief base derived from 10 m NED data. Downloadable Data not currently available. </gco:CharacterString> </gmd:abstract> <gmd:status> <gmd:MD_ProgressCode
